quality.title: Quality @ EVO Engineering
quality.subtitle: We are 'qualiteers' from the bottom of our hearts.
quality.p1: Basis of our Quality Management System (QMS) are international standards such as ISO 9001 as well as customer, legal and other requirements.
quality.p2: By establishing a QMS right from the very beginning we aim to ensure compliance with and correct implementation of all quality management requirements.
quality.p3: We continuously develop our competencies to be able to offer best-of-class quality to our customers and to meet or  rather exceed their expectations.
quality.p4: EVO's top management is  commited in running, maintaining and continuously improving our QMS, and we will ensure that this policy ist communicated and performed within all levels of EVO staff.

compliance.metaTitle: Compliance & Code of Ethics | EVO Engineering GmbH
compliance.metaDescription: It is fundamental to the success of our company that we make well-grounded decisions at all times as business partners, suppliers, customers, and an employer.

content.p1: Compliance is not an empty phrase for us, it is a self-evident obligation, every day.
content.p2: It is fundamental to the success of our company that we make well-grounded decisions at all times as business partners, suppliers, customers, and an employer. One basis for these decisions are
content.l1:
• Applicable laws
  • The ten principles of the United Nations Global Compact on human rights, labor, environmental responsibility and anti-corruption, and
  • Our corporate values
content.p3: All employees of EVO Engineering GmbH are obliged to comply with these rules.
content.p4: Our employees' well-being is very important to us. They shall all have proper working conditions for their health and safety. We all deserve mutual respect.
content.p5: EVO wants to provide jobs, that are free of discrimination and harassment based on gender, race, skin color, religion, age, nationality, disabilities, or sexual orientation. Neither bullying nor discrimination is tolerated.
content.p6: Conflicts of interest shall be avoided, e.g by not hiring close relatives as direct subordinates. In case a potential conflict of interest is noticed, it is expected to be reported proactively, and each case is assessed case by case.
content.p7: We do not tolerate corruption or bribery of any kind. It is prohibited to give or accept, any gifts or respective, which could impair the objective business decision making
content.p8: Knowledge and information is our biggest asset, so we protect them as well as possible.
content.p9: We never disclose any business secrets to anyone who is not entitled to that information.
content.p10: Any business information, whether it is digital, physical, or spoken, is handled with care. All EVO employees adhere to strict guidelines, e.g. clear/clean desk/screen policy and information handling policy.
content.p11: In case we get to know insider information, we use it only in a manner allowed by applicable laws.
content.p12: We apply the specifications of EU-GDPR and local laws.
content.p13:
We expect corresponding policies and behavior from our partners, suppliers, and customers.
, Awareness and open communication are very important to us. So everybody is obliged to speak up if any violation of laws or this code of conduct is perceived and contact one's manager. We will protect whistle-blowers in accordance with applicable law.
